name: Shayspec. ONE-OFF Custom Delrin Shift Knob
description:
This is the a one of a kind shift knob. No other knob will be just like it. Don't miss out! Shayspec. Custom Delrin Shiftknob Height: 6" Diameter: 1-1/2" (big end) Bore: 1" Deep / .5" Dia. HONDA THREAD PITCH The threads are tapped 2" into shifter to give the shifter great strength. Custom Knurled design gives a great aesthetic look and feel. "Ergonomically Cut" grooves are cut into the knob to allow it to fit in your hand. ________________ This product may not be legal for highway use. - Shayspec.© is not responsible for any direct or indirect, actual or incidental expense attributed to the use of any performance parts sold by Shayspec.© - Purchasers agree to all of the terms of this agreement upon the purchase of parts. ________________

Shipping & Handling

All orders are shipped via USPS.
Please allow a 3-5 business days for your order to ship.
Do not hesitate to contact us with questions or concerns.

name: Shayspec. Custom H22 Engine Oil Dipstick
description:
Shayspec. Custom Engine Oil Dipstick This is a custom handle attached to a BRAND NEW OEM Honda Dipstick. Once out of stock, there will be no more of these available. Custom Drilled to adapt to the following motors: H22a1 H23a1 H22a Each H and F motor from honda has various dipstick lengths and hole placement. This custom dipstick is the stick to rule them all! When using this dipstick you would be able to correctly measure the amount of oil in all three of these motor types. _________________ This product may not be legal for highway use. - Shayspec.© is not responsible for any direct or indirect, actual or incidental expense attributed to the use of any performance parts sold by Shayspec.© - Purchasers agree to all of the terms of this agreement upon the purchase of parts. _________________

name: Shayspec. Delrin Shift Knob - BLACK
description:
Shayspec. BLACK Delrin Shift Knob »Specs: 1-1/4" Dia. 3-1/2" Height - SHORTIE 5-1/2" Height. - EXTENDED »»»Honda Thread Pitch (M10x 1.5) » Black Delrin Material _________________ Delrin is a lighter weight material, but very strong and durable. Delrin is also very temperature resistant, making this knob great both for daily drivers and higher performance chassis alike. No more getting into your car on a cold morning with a freezing cold shift knob to greet you! A custom knurling design along the knob insures a great grip and feel in your hand while shifting gears. _________________ This product may not be legal for highway use. - Shayspec.© is not responsible for any direct or indirect, actual or incidental expense attributed to the use of any performance parts sold by Shayspec.© - Purchasers agree to all of the terms of this agreement upon the purchase of parts. _________________

name: Shayspec. PCV Delete Plug
description:
